title: help please, issue with clubs
body:
After that long ass time where no one could see their own clubs, riot fixed the issue but for some reason my club named 'Flawless' with the tag 'Flaw' disappeared for me but my friends say im still in the club, don't know what to do.
my IGN is FlawlessKasper

replies.body:
Sorry we missed you! We'll be able to work with you to resolve this for you and your club if you submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) into us.

Let me know if you have any questions.
